text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Knock, knock, knock.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Trainer, can we talk?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
What is it? Unless it's urgent, I'd<n>rather you rest after such
a big race.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
What is it? Unless it's urgent, I'd<n>rather you rest after such
a big race.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I wouldn't say it's urgent, but there<n>is something I wanted
to say as soon<n>as possible.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I realized something after today's<n>race. I don't think I've
ever actually<n>thanked you.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Thanked me? For what?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Even though I was on a different<n>team, you still approached
me like I<n>was one of your trainees.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
And when I asked to move to your<n>team, you accepted my
request<n>without a single complaint.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
That's nothing special... In fact, I was<n>worried I might be
overstepping.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Hehe...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
After joining Team Sirius and getting<n>to know my new
teammates, I can tell<n>what sort of person you are.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
You wholeheartedly believe in us all<n>and do everything you
can to support<n>us.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
That's why I want to give you a<n>proper thank-you, but...
could you wait<n>just a little longer?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You really don't need to...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: No, I want to show my gratitude.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
And I'll do it by running with you<n>towards that beautiful
scenery.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As she speaks, Silence Suzuka's<n>expression is soft and
filled with the<n>same joy she has while running.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Well, if it's a thank-you like that, I<n>suppose I can accept it.
choice_data_list:
We'd better keep our eyes on the scenery
ahead!

We'd better keep our eyes on the scenery
ahead!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Right!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's finally snatched her first<n>victory as a member of
Team Sirius.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As her skills and heart soar upward, I<n>can't help but
wonder what sort of<n>views she'll show me in the future.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Whatever they look like, I'm sure<n>they'll be joyous and
fantastical.
